resources.string: BTVi3 FW have a new version ,update now.

Welcome to BTVi3, By using this service you agree to the Terms of Service (TOS) on Legacy Direct websites. Legacy Direct reserves the right to change the TOS at any time. If you do not agree to any of these terms, please refrain from using the BTVi3 services and products.
The programs shown are from internet and for learning purpose. Please check with Legacy Direct Term Of Service.
Please go to app market download and install
Congratulations !register success , please go to your email confirm then login you account
Sorry, your account login error ,please login again
Please contact support@legacy.direct or text to 9499889000 to inquire about this issue.

Legacy Direct cares We offer multiple avenues of support to tend to the individual needs of all BTVi3 users. Please choose an option below: 

 *Email: Send a message 24 hours a day to Support and they will respond as soon as possible. Support@Legacy.Direct

 *Ticket: Submit a ticket to our Support Team as an alternative to email by clicking on Our Help Desk on our Contact Us page or by going to http://legacydirect.supportsystem.com 

 *Text: Send a text message to our Customer Care number at (949) 988-9000 We look forward to helping you 

 *Call: (949) 988-9000 

 *Premium Support: For users that choose to add this service we offer an option to have an agent operate the device themselves to assist in any and every need via a peer to peer connection.
